trans-unit.source: Lists a Conditional Assignment example in <token>af_integration_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: Lists a Conditional Assignment example in <token>af_integration_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: The input document has a <legacyBold>Person</legacyBold> node with a <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field.
trans-unit.target: The input document has a <legacyBold>Person</legacyBold> node with a <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field.

trans-unit.source: The output document also has a <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field.
trans-unit.target: The output document also has a <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field.

trans-unit.source: The goal is for the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the output document be created <legacyItalic>only</legacyItalic> if <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> exists in the input document <legacyUnderline>and</legacyUnderline> if the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field is not null.
trans-unit.target: The goal is for the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the output document be created <legacyItalic>only</legacyItalic> if <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> exists in the input document <legacyUnderline>and</legacyUnderline> if the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field is not null.

trans-unit.source: To do this, use the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>:
trans-unit.target: To do this, use the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>:

trans-unit.source: Drag the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token> to the <token>transform</token> Designer area.
trans-unit.target: Drag the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token> to the <token>transform</token> Designer area.

trans-unit.source: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the output document to this Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the output document to this Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Add a Logical Expression <token>mapop</token> and do the following:
trans-unit.target: Add a Logical Expression <token>mapop</token> and do the following:

trans-unit.source: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the input document to this Logical Expression <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the input document to this Logical Expression <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Configure the Logical Expression <token>mapop</token> to state: <legacyBold>Exists(Title) && !IsEmpty(Title)</legacyBold>
trans-unit.target: Configure the Logical Expression <token>mapop</token> to state: <legacyBold>Exists(Title) && !IsEmpty(Title)</legacyBold>

trans-unit.source: Create a link from the output of this Logical Expression as the first input to the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create a link from the output of this Logical Expression as the first input to the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the input document to the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create a link from the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> field in the input document to the Conditional Assignment <token>mapop</token>.

trans-unit.source: With this <token>transform</token>, the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> node in the output is created <legacyUnderline>only</legacyUnderline> if the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> node in the input document exists and is non-empty.
trans-unit.target: With this <token>transform</token>, the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> node in the output is created <legacyUnderline>only</legacyUnderline> if the <legacyBold>Title</legacyBold> node in the input document exists and is non-empty.
